result.title: Invitation for SnackDown 2016 Pre-Elimination Round B Replay Contest on Codechef
result.content:
Hello CodeForces Community!

I would like to invite you to the Replay Contest of CodeChef SnackDown 2016 Pre-Elimination Round B which begins in few hours i.e at 9 PM IST, 13th June, just after the main contest.

The problems have been set and tested by kevinsogo (Kevin Charles Atienza), Antoniuk (Vasya Antoniuk), Cherrytree (Sergey Kulik) and the translations are written by huzecong (Hu Zecong), Antoniuk (Vasya Antoniuk), VNOI Team, Cherrytree (Sergey Kulik), with PraveenDhinwa (Praveen Dhinwa) as contest admin.

Registration: The contest is open for all and it will be a team based contest with a maximum of up to 2 members in a team. One need to have a CodeChef account and register as a team here to take part in the contest.

Contest link: https://www.codechef.com/SNPB16RP

I am sure it promises to deliver an interesting problem set, hope you enjoy solving the problems. Please feel free to give your feedback about the problems in comments below.

See you all at the contest.

Regards,
Praveen Dhinwa
